title: Who Is The Ghost In the Trench Coat?
description:
It all started with a strange man standing in the basement wearing a trench coat. It wasn’t a family member, it wasn’t a friend, it wasn’t living. It was however the first paranormal experience for Sean Bowman. A first experience of many that would lead to a life that involved seeking out answers to the paranormal questions that plague all of us. What happened when Sean investigated a location, and another investigator came under possession? We as that question and many more, today on The Grave Talks.

 In part two of our interview, available only to Grave Keepers, we discuss:

    • What was Sean feeling as his friend appeared to become possessed during an investigation?
    • Does Sean think he’s been followed by anything paranormal?
    • What happened at a haunted castle in Ohio when Sean investigated it?
    • Can a structure's architecture invite paranormal activity?

  • As a Grave Keeper, for $5 per month you will get:
  • Access to every episode of our show, AD-FREE – MONTHS BEFORE THEY GO PUBLIC.
  • Access to every EXCLUSIVE PART 2 episode of our show for Grave Keeper Only!
  • Access to submit questions to upcoming guests of our show.
  • The “good feeling” knowing that you are keeping this show alive (It really does feel good!)
Listen to part two of this interview and get exclusive access to HUNDREDS of bonus episodes at http://www.patreon.com/thegravetalks
